Subskills.name: Shrapnel
Subskills.description: Increases the amount of shrapnel when using frag grenade.

Subskills.name: Fatal Range
Subskills.description: Increases the explosion area of effect radius.

Subskills.name: Cluster Bomb
Subskills.description: Throw a cluster bomb exploding into multiple frag grenades around the impact point.

Subskills.name: Detonating
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by frag grenade.

Subskills.name: Increased Potency
Subskills.description: Increased the size of frag grenade and shrapnel.

Subskills.name: Giga Grenade
Subskills.description: Throw a huge grenade with increased explosion radius and damage.

Subskills.name: Stunning Casualty
Subskills.description: Increased damage dealt to stunned targets.

Subskills.name: Blasting Wave
Subskills.description: Knock monsters back on hit dealing additional damage and stunning when hitting terrain.

Subskills.name: Smell of Burning
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to burning targets.

Subskills.name: Grenadier
Subskills.description: Throw frag grenades rapidly into all directions.

Subskills.name: Flames and Explosions
Subskills.description: Incendiary grenades sets the area under monsters hit on fire dealing additional fire damage causing burning.
